headline.print_headline: Nigeria Says It Has Freed 300 Hostages of Militants
headline.main: Nigerian Military Says It Has Rescued Over 300 Held by Boko Haram

snippet: The military said it killed at least 30 Boko Haram fighters in an operation to free captives in a remote area, but officials in the nearest major city could not confirm the assertions.
abstract: Nigerian military announces it has freed more than 300 people who were kidnapped by militant group Boko Haram; majority are women and children; at least 30 Boko Haram fighters are killed in operation.
lead_paragraph: The military said it killed at least 30 Boko Haram fighters in an operation to free captives in a remote area, but officials in the nearest major city could not confirm the assertions.
